attributes.action: support the National Decontamination Programme in it's aims to improve standards in Sterile Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Decontamination Strategy aims to improve standards in decontamination of surgical instruments. It is a challenging programme, involving many stakeholders some of whom see the Strategy as a risk to patient safety by moving services offsite. However it is proven that the programme is improving standards by exposing chronic under investment and areas of bad practice. For the sake of patients, the strategy must be supported and the people across the industry working tirelessly to improve standards,
